fields.headline: Ins and outs
fields.bodyText: Helen Bailey has announced that she will be quitting her post as chief executive of Islington council in north London, which she has held since August 2002. The Health Protection Agency has appointed Justin McCracken as its new chief executive. He is currently deputy chief executive of the Health and Safety Executive. He replaces Pat Troop who retires in April. Antony Sheehan, chief executive of Leicestershire Partnership NHS trust, will next month become chair of mental health charity Together, in place of Julia Ross. The Disabilities Trust has voted Barrie Oldham as its new chief executive officer. He was previously director of operations. Kate Mountain has stood down as chief executive of Socitm, the local government IT organisation. The chief executive of the Child Support Agency, Stephen Geraghty, will take up the role of commissioner designate of the new Child Maintenance and Enforcement Commission. Chris Carney has retired as chief executive of the East of England Ambulance Service.
